price: ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߕߎ߲߬ ߓߴߦߋ߲߬ ߟߊߒߠߦߊߓߊ߮ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߊ߲ ߞߵߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊߓߐ߫
arabic: فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhrajnā man kāna fīhā mina al-mu'minīna
